name: puppeteer-extra-plugin-stealth
description: Stealth mode: Applies various techniques to make detection of headless puppeteer harder.
author: berstend

scripts.docs-for-plugin: documentation readme --quiet --shallow --github --markdown-theme transitivebs --readme-file readme.md --section API index.js
scripts.docs-for-evasions: cd ./evasions && loop "documentation readme --quiet --shallow --github --markdown-theme transitivebs --readme-file readme.md --section API index.js"
